transpositions.title: Overview of the ISO governance structure
transpositions.text:
# Overview of the ISO governance structure

~? Governance hierarchy:
-General Assembly
-Council
-Technical Management Board
-Technical Committees

~? General Assembly:
-the **highest instance**,
-composed of **all members**,
-and **takes** **key high-level decisions**.

~? Council:
-the **executive instance**,
-composed of **representatives** of 20 **members**,
- **appoints** the **TMB** and **proposes** **strategies**.

~? Technical Management Board:
-the **highest technical work instance**,
-composed of **15** **elected** **members**,
-**oversees** the **technical work**,
-and **appoints** **technical committees**.

~? ISO Central Secretariat:
-**coordinates** **standards development activities** and **publishes the standards**.
